Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.util

Class AbstractReport

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.SimEntity
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.util.AbstractReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventSink<SimEvent>
public abstract class AbstractReport extends SimEntity
Helper class used to create a simulation report.
Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

    • onShutdown

      public void onShutdown()
      This method is invoked by the Simulation before the simulation finishes. If you want to save data in log files this is the method in which the corresponding code would be placed.
      Specified by:
      onShutdown in class SimEntity
